reason: Skip tests excluded in upstream CI
Slirp tests don't work with QEMU from CNV D/S
virt-launcher container image does not have ethtool

id: with cni flannel and ptp plugin interface
reason: Genie don't work D/S
OVS CNI is not supported in CNV 2.0, tests are being migrated to use linux-bridge (https://github.com/kubevirt/kubevirt/pull/2330)
openshift does not allow the creation of networks in a different namespace (see https://github.com/openshift/multus-cni/blob/master/doc/configuration.md#namespace-isolation)
EFI without SecureBoot is not supported in CNV D/S, so skip it. (https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1684772) Only, EFI with SecureBoot is supported D/S, so run that.
